entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
